pullRequest.title: Add aliases during CGMES import for missing IDs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements (please use '[x]' to check the checkboxes, or submit the PR and then click the checkboxes)

 The commit message follows our guidelines
 Tests for the changes have been added (for bug fixes / features)

Does this PR already have an issue describing the problem ? If so, link to this issue using '#XXX' and skip the rest
No
What kind of change does this PR introduce? (Bug fix, feature, docs update, ...)
Feature
What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
Terminals' and tap changer's IDs are lost during CGMES import
What is the new behavior (if this is a feature change)?
These IDs are kept as aliases
Does this PR introduce a breaking change or deprecate an API? If yes, check the following:
No
Other information:
(if any of the questions/checkboxes don't apply, please delete them entirely)

commit.message:
Use aliases in CGMES

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

All tap changers are kept in memory, not only one

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Small correction for default behaviour of tapChangersForPowerTransformer(String)

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

addAlias TOPOLOGICAL_NODES for boundary nodes (dangling line)

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

# Conflicts:
#	cgmes/cgmes-conversion/src/main/java/com/powsybl/cgmes/conversion/elements/ACLineSegmentConversion.java

Add the prefix "CGMES." in alias type to check the type will be unique to CGMES import

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Update of StateVariablesAdder for more complete SV file

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Update CGMES Comparison to compare aliases

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

Correct sonarcloud smell

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

CgmesModel.terminalForEquipment(String, int) is now deprecated + javadoc

Signed-off-by: RALAMBOTIANA MIORA <miora.ralambotiana@rte-france.com>

commit.message:
add aliases on merged line resulting from line-switch configuration at boundary

Signed-off-by: Luma <zamarrenolm@aia.es>

nodes.bodyText: Missing addAliases for merged line when line-switch configuration is seen at boundary ?
